Today, on #FathersDay, I miss my dad, Bill. He was a World War II Veteran, a small business person and a loving father.  His integrity and midwestern values continue to inspire me every day. pic.twitter.com/JJFQwK7DLq
To my fellow dads, I hope you have an enjoyable #FathersDay. Being a dad to my 3 kids is my greatest joy in life. I’m proud of them and feel blessed to be their father. Happy #FathersDay

Helping families keep in touch w/ incarcerated family members is an important way to help reduce recidivism in #Ohio & across the US. Introduced bipartisan legislation this week to address the problem of unreasonably expensive phone calls in our prisons  https://bit.ly/2ZjYYln

Investing in our nation’s #infrastructure & skilled workforce go hand-in-hand. Across #Ohio, employers need more skilled workers. My bipartisan #BUILDSAct will provide resources for #job training targeted towards in-demand infrastructure #jobs  https://bit.ly/2Q4UMCM

My bipartisan Retirement Savings & Security Act will raise the age to 75 & for people with less than $100,000 in their retirement account, remove the requirement entirely. Giving seniors more flexibility in their retirement & more peace of mind.

Under our current retirement system, Americans are forced to start withdrawing from their retirement savings at age 70 ½, even if they’re still working. My own father was still working at 70 ½ & I know this law is frustrating for many people. https://youtu.be/XaJDvlbF06I

Proud of the widespread support from key stakeholders for the Retirement Security & Savings Act I introduced with @SenatorCardin. It will help Americans save more for their retirement. Read what they have to say here:  https://bit.ly/2JOUeR0

We’ve got a long way to go, as this story shows. I remain committed to continuing to doing everything I can help our families and children in #Ohio and around the country who are struggling to overcome the disease of addiction. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/05/31/us/opioid-children-addiction.html …

I’m working at the federal level to help. My #CARA law is providing $647M this year for more education, treatment, & recovery services, and my #STOPAct measure is working to help stop the flow of fentanyl from China & Mexico through our mail system.

It tells the story of a number of students at Portsmouth High School with parents who are suffering from addiction, many of whom started with prescription painkillers and then moved to heroin and now fentanyl.

This is a heartbreaking @nytimes piece worth reading about the devastation that the opioid epidemic continues to cause in #Ohio.  It shows, as I’ve talked about in several dozen Senate floor speeches, that this crisis is tearing families apart.  https://www.nytimes.com/2019/05/31/us/opioid-children-addiction.html …

I was proud to sponsor the Second Chance Act that allowed the Hamilton Office of Reentry to be created. The women who graduated today w/ the #job skills to gain full-time employment are proof that the mistakes of our past don’t have to define the potential of our future. pic.twitter.com/B9tgWQVhNy

I was honored to participate in a graduation ceremony today at River City Correctional Center. These courageous women graduated w/ a certificate in Supply Chain logistics that will prepare them for a career after their release & help them to live up to their God-given potential. pic.twitter.com/rpQHWuvua2

Sadly, by age 24 almost 50% of our foster youth are not employed & more than 70% rely on some form of govt assistance. I’ve introduced legislation to expand the Work Opportunity Tax Credit to include our foster youth & help get them off the sidelines & into good-paying #jobs.
https://bit.ly/2LZuxiF

My bipartisan Artificial Intelligence Initiative Act will organize a coordinated national strategy for developing AI & synchronize our country’s research & development efforts. It ensures that the US remains an AI leader & develops AI tech that prioritizes American values.

Last week I traveled to #Dayton to survey the immense storm damage that the tornadoes caused in SW #Ohio. I was heartened to see all the great work that our law enforcement, first responders and other volunteers were doing to help those in need. pic.twitter.com/hbEuY9MU0W

#Ukraine’s economy has made strides over the past 5 years as the govt has undertaken significant structural reforms to reduce corruption & create an environment that welcomes investment. But much more to be done. I was encouraged after my meetings w/ Ukrainian leaders. pic.twitter.com/XgiaXsRcdr

We have a strong economy but must do more to help every America share in the prosperity.  My bipartisan #JOBSAct will help students and businesses by closing the skills-gap & helping more #Ohioans get the skills training they need to get good-paying #jobs.  https://bit.ly/2MvAFzI

The threats & hateful attacks we’ve seen across our nation on houses of worship are attacks on our values & principles. My bipartisan legislation will help protect faith & cultural based institutions in #Ohio & across our country.  https://bit.ly/2Vrv6Bm

People aren’t saving enough for their retirement. After a lifetime of work, you should be able to build up enough for a financially-secure retirement.

The fall application for the U.S. Senate page program closes on June 14th. If you’re from #Ohio & interested in serving as a page for the U.S. Senate, you can apply on my website.  https://www.portman.senate.gov/services/students …

Today is #NationalTrailsDay! What better way to start off summer than hiking one of Ohio’s many trails. If you are in NE OH check out CuyValleyNatPark. My bipartisan Restore Our Parks Act provides needed funding so @NatlParkService can maintain these natl parks & trails.
